title: US to hike military aid, send military ships and aircraft closer to Israel

title: No place for Gaza residents to flee after Israel declares war, bombs homes
description: Residential buildings in besieged strip bombed by Israel forces, killing hundreds, after Hamas's unprecedented attack.

description: The Israeli city wakes up from its shock and confusion, making timid efforts to confront a new reality.

title: Powerful earthquakes kill 2,053 people in Afghanistan. Here is what to know

title: Why are so many Palestinian prisoners in Israeli jails?
